original_text: For a male between five years and 20 years old, they must give to God 20 pieces of silver. For a female, they must give ten pieces of silver.
korean_text: 다섯 살로부터 스무 살까지는 남자면 그 값을 이십 세겔로 하고 여자면 열 세겔로 하며

sentences.original_text: For a male between five years and 20 years old
sentences.korean_translation: 다섯 살에서 스무 살 사이의 남성은

sentences.original_text: they must give to God 20 pieces of silver
they must give ten pieces of silver
